More Notes: Total designed wastewater treatment capacity in 2011.
Average cost of water production, transmission, distribution, and subsidies (%) in the GCC countries, ranging from 20% to 40% (we assume an average of 30%)
Reuse rates are less than 40% of treated wastewater volumes
The cumulative savings result from improving irrigation efficiency across the GCC countries from 2016 to 2035, leading to reduced agricultural water demand.
The municipal water supply requirements would decrease by 3.7 BCM in 2035 compared to the BAU scenario due to improved water efficiency strategies.
